name: Samantha Rivera
persona: Samantha Rivera is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a 2.83 CGPA. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to achieve higher grades, often putting in consistent effort despite occasional challenges with self-discipline and test anxiety. Samantha believes in her ability to succeed academically and demonstrates strong perseverance when faced with setbacks. She is eager to improve her study habits and is actively seeking ways to better manage her stress around exams. Her resilience and determination help her stay focused on her long-term goals.
